original_title: Fatal Deception: Mrs. Lee Harvey Oswald
overview: The story of the widow of Lee Harvey Oswald, the man accused of shooting President Kennedy. Via flashbacks, the story traces the woman's life from her days in Russia, the turmoil following the assassination, raising her family, and coming to grips with the fact that she too may have been a pawn in a grand conspiracy.
title: Fatal Deception: Mrs. Lee Harvey Oswald
